#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int t,n,k,distinct[20005],i,f,j,sum;

    char x[20005],currentelement,previous;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>k;
        cin>>x;
        j=0;
          sum=0;
        for(i=0;i<=20004;i++)
            distinct[i]=0;

        distinct[j]=1;

        currentelement=x[0];
        for(i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
          if(currentelement==x[i])
          {
              distinct[j]++;
          }
          else
          {
              j++;
              distinct[j]=1;
              currentelement=x[i];
          }
        }
        f=0;
        for(i=0;i<=j;i++)
        {
            //cout<<x[i]<<endl;
           if(distinct[i]>=k)
           {
               f=1;
               break;
           }
        }
        if(f==0)
        {
            cout<<-1<<"\n";
        }
        else
           {

               for(i=0;i<=j;i++)
               {
                   sum=sum+(distinct[i]/k);
                   if(distinct[i]%k!=0)
                    sum+=1;
               }
               cout<<sum<<endl;
           }
    }
}
